executable.title: Resample DWI In Place
executable.description: Resamples DWI image to structural image.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta, Greg Harris, Hans Johnson, and Joy Matsui.

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input image is a 4D NRRD image.
image.label: Input Image Volume

image.name: referenceVolume
image.description: If provided, resample to the final space of the referenceVolume 3D data set.
image.label: Input Reference Image Volume

image.name: outputResampledB0
image.description: Convenience function for extracting the first index location (assumed to be the B0)
image.label: Resampled B0 output

transform.name: inputTransform
transform.description: Required: transform file derived from rigid registration of b0 image to reference structural image.
transform.label: Input Transform

transform.name: warpDWITransform
transform.description: Optional: transform file to warp gradient volumes.
transform.label: general Transform

integer.name: debugLevel
integer.label: Debug option
integer.description: Display debug messages, and produce debug intermediate results. 0=OFF, 1=Minimal, 10=Maximum debugging.

file.name: writeOutputMetaData
file.label: Output MetaData CSV File
file.description: A file to write the output image diffusion gradient directions in a CSV file

integer-vector.name: imageOutputSize
integer-vector.label: Image Output Padding
integer-vector.description: The voxel lattice for the output image, padding is added if necessary. NOTE: if 0,0,0, then the inputVolume size is used.

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: output image (NRRD file) that has been rigidly transformed into the space of the structural image and padded if image padding was changed from 0,0,0 default.
image.label: Output File

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
